summary: The module defines a comprehensive set of unit tests for the Microsoft Authentication Library (MSAL) application layer, verifying token acquisition, refresh logic, client capability merging, byte/string conversion, authority alias handling, account grouping, certificate extraction from HTML, and telemetry collection and offline caching across public, confidential, and client applications.
business_intent: Validate the correctness, robustness, and compliance of the authentication client implementation, ensuring reliable token handling, proper telemetry reporting, and correct behavior under various edge cases and migration scenarios.
